title: Big yellow taxi
creator_credit: John Wilson and Fine Art Productions
brief_description: Joni Mitchell sings to an animated interpretation of her lyrics in this film with a clear environmental warning. Adam and Eve’s paradise is invaded by powerful road-making machinery that proceeds to tear down the vegetation and cover the earth with tar and cement.
